answers.answer: Prayers
Prayers are sent
My friend had her baby girl at 21weeks and yes she spent little over a month in NICU but shes fine :-) and 3yrs old
Prayers yalls way , keep us updated<3
My niece was born at 24 week's and is now 15! It is a small chance tell your friend it will be ok!
Prayers!  Hoping for the best.
Same my friend had her baby girl at 24 weeks and she made it
My long time friend had her son at 24 weeks and he was just over a pound now he's 6 months and 13 lbs. Everything will be okay! Praters sent.
Prayers*
Prayers Go Out To Her And Her Unborn.
Prayers <3
I hope everything turns out okay & baby make it just fine, prayers sent your way. Keep reminding your friend everything will be okay!
Prayers being sent up! ↑
Prayers will be sent your way!❤️
Prayers. I hope everything goes well.

Thank you ladies!! Aubrey Rose was born at 9:44 pm weighing 1 1/2 lbs. They're keeping here here for a few hrs in NICU and if she survives (praying she does) she'll be transferred to downtown NICU. She's soo precious and small!! I love her already!
I hope the beautiful baby survives
Prayers
Prayers for both! Hope the baby survives!
Sending positive vibes your way!
Prayers sent keep us posted. My brother was born at 28 weeks 30 years ago. It took him a while in nicu but now you cant tell he was a premi
Keep hope!
Sending lots of prayers to her amazing babygirl:) and to mom tell her to stay strong!
Prayers coming their way. Tell her to have faith in God, miracles happen!!!
Prayers for your friend and her baby
Sending good thoughts your way! Keep us updated!
Sendin prayers yo way
Prayers to her and her precious baby girl.... please keep us posted!!!

With all of the amazing things doctors and hospitals can do, tell her not to give up just yet! A friend of mine had her baby at 22 weeks, and he's now a normal, happy 2 year old. Tell her to push, and let the doctors get to the baby as soon as they possibly can. The quicker they start medical care, the higher the chance they'll make it.
Praying keep us updated..
Prayers sent.
God bless her

babytaylordixie hun how did she survive at 21weeks babys born that early hasnt got a chance living born between 20,21weeks i had my daughter at 21weeks and 6days and she passeed away they said shes to early and they couldnt do anything they didnt even try so i dont understand the vjat born 21weeks but they did fond a infection in her stomach and didnt give her anu antibotics  and now its making me annoyed now my daughter could of made it if they tried :-) but im glad that baby is fine and I'll pray for your friend how come she has to give birth now if you dont mind me  asking if you dont wanna answer its fine ive delieved 2baby girls before 24weeks 23weeks and 21+6days they did try with my first but my waters went early so they didnt try anymore because they said her chest was ripping and they stopped and then they didnt try with my babygirl in november because they said shes small and to early but think positive your friends story is scarry you know but I no and understand because ive been there good luck and I'll pray for her

BrittanyBear00Ive lost 3 all together im expecting my 4th and  a little girl im still nervous but on sunday i'll be 24weeks ive passed the weeks i didnt im having/got faith and your friends baby is gonna be ok
prayers to your friend and her sweet baby. i hope her baby survives.
Aww pretty name! Prayers for your friend and sweet Aubrey!
Keep us posted please...im so sorry she and baby hav 2 go thru this...I pray everything is okay
I hope everything turns out good and both your friend and her baby find themselves in the best health.
Prayers for her baby girl

My condolences go out to all of you who have had to experience something so horrible as to losing a child. My friends baby is doing good at the moment, their transferring her downtown to the NICU that accepts children under 30 weeks. The only hard part is she's in the hospital for 2 days, so instead of walking to see her baby in the other room. She has to wait until she's out of the hospital and drive over there. Dr's say she's looking good, but only time can tell!! Thank you ladies for all of your prayers, I truly believe they helped! As of my friend, she's finally calmed down and getting some sleep!
Congratulations to the new mother and I will keep her family in my prayers!!!!!
Praying for mom and baby girl

Yay! That's wonderful news. Doctors can work miracles with babies <3 technology has come a long way. I'm sure that sweet baby will be just fine :) it'll be a long road and a good stay in the hospital, but so worth it. Hope mama is doing well and staying as calm as she can! Congrats to her!
Lots of prayers for the baby she will make it and try to give ypur friend all the support so she can keep calm her baby is well lots of prayers to the mom and baby...

Lots of prayers!! I lost my nephew in February. He was 10 days old and he came at 26 weeks. My sister had preeclampsia and it was causing all of her organs to shut down and her liver enzymes were through the roof. Her body was rejecting her son. I will be praying for this little one and her family!! Please keep us updated on this? Thanks! And stay positive! :)

I was born at 21 weeks in 1994 because my mom was in a coma.  I spent six months in nicu, and after that when I went home,  had to be hooked up to monitors that beeped if my heart rate or breathing rate was abnormal. I'm now 20, and completely healthy besides chronic bronchitis,  seasonal allergy induced asthma,  and anxiety,  and only one of those is from being born that early.  Prayers,  and there's always hope
Prayers sent your way <3
Any update?
I wish the best for your friend and her baby. And even you for sticking by her side. She needs people to be there for her right now. Please keeps us updated.

question: I'm here at the hospital in the waiting room. My good friend is 24 weeks and about to give birth. The Dr's said there's not a high chance of them living so she's freaking out and WILL NOT PUSH. She's trying to keep the baby in, but is only making it worse. I know this is hurting her extremely bad. Please pray that her baby girl will be just fine.
title: Prayers please!!
